api_list.name: Ukraine news feed from specific newspaper
api_list.description:
Ukraine news feed from specific newspaper 
Posible Newspaper Ids:
- thetimes
- thetelegraph
- theguardian
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://testingkm.p.rapidapi.com/ukraine/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "testingkm.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://testingkm.p.rapidapi.com/ukraine/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "testingkm.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
